description: Listed only by Audsley, who says: �When as a Pedal Organ stop of 16 ft. pitch, [Rohrflöte] is appropriately named Rohrflötenbass.� Examples Rohrflötenbass 1', Pedal; St. Blasius, Mülhausen, Germany; Wender 1691.
